test_scenarios.name: story_generation_workflow
test_scenarios.description: End-to-end story generation from user perspective
test_scenarios.user_story: As a user, I want to generate engaging stories using different characters so that I can create compelling narratives for my campaign
acceptance_criteria: I can select characters from available options
The system generates coherent stories with selected characters
Character names are properly integrated in the generated content
No 'For Unknown' or placeholder text appears in the output
The story is engaging and makes narrative sense
The generation completes within reasonable time (< 30 seconds)

user_feedback.overall: The system failed to generate any story content. This is unacceptable.

engineer.reasoning: Agent chose to wait and observe the situation

pilot.reasoning: Agent chose to wait and observe the situation

test_scenarios.name: campaign_management_workflow
test_scenarios.description: Campaign log transcription from user perspective
test_scenarios.user_story: As a user, I want to convert my campaign logs into narrative format so that I can share engaging stories of my gaming sessions
acceptance_criteria: I can provide a campaign log file to the system
The system processes the campaign log without errors
The output is a well-formatted narrative
The narrative maintains the essence of the original campaign
The process completes in reasonable time

user_feedback.overall: The narrative has significant problems: Narrative lacks proper formatting, Not all characters properly mentioned in narrative, Narrative doesn't capture the essence of the original campaign

evidence.original_log_excerpt:
# Epic Space Campaign - Session 47
## Turn 1
- **pilot**: Carefully maneuvered the ship through the asteroid field, avoiding the larger chunks of debris
- **engineer**: Worked frantically to repair the damaged hull breach in section C-7
- **scientist**: Analyzed the strange energy readings coming fr
evidence.generated_narrative_excerpt:
In the vast expanse of space, where conflict shapes destiny, this chronicle records a moment of stillness. Perhaps it was the calm before the storm, or perhaps it was the silence that follows great devastation. In the vastness of the galaxy, even silence carries weight.

Chronicle source: tmp0vvjsqth.md
Status: No significant events recorded

In the name of peace, even the absence of war serves the greater purpose.

generated_narrative.narrative_content:
In the vast expanse of space, where conflict shapes destiny, this chronicle records a moment of stillness. Perhaps it was the calm before the storm, or perhaps it was the silence that follows great devastation. In the vastness of the galaxy, even silence carries weight.

Status: No significant events recorded

issues_encountered: Not all characters properly mentioned in narrative
Narrative doesn't capture the essence of the original campaign

test_scenarios.name: system_usability_workflow
test_scenarios.description: Overall system usability from user perspective
test_scenarios.user_story: As a user, I want the system to be intuitive and reliable so that I can focus on creating content rather than fighting with the tool
acceptance_criteria: The system provides clear feedback when operations succeed or fail
Error messages are user-friendly and actionable
The system recovers gracefully from errors
The system maintains consistency across multiple uses
I can easily understand what the system is doing

user_feedback.overall: Generally good usability with minor issues: Unclear system feedback

recommendations: HIGH PRIORITY: Improve character name integration - users expect their chosen characters to be prominently featured
LOW PRIORITY: Improve output formatting - users want professional-looking narratives
CRITICAL: System not ready for production deployment - address user concerns before release
CRITICAL: Major usability overhaul needed - current system does not meet user needs
